response.overview: The Daywalker known as "Blade" - a half-vampire, half-mortal man - becomes the protector of humanity against an underground army of vampires.
response.tagline: Against an army of Immortals, one warrior must draw first blood.
response.title: Blade

crew.name: Jody Levin

results.name: Behind The Scenes: Origins of Blade - A Look at Dark Comics
